content.rendered: [vc_row][vc_column][block_title title=”DISA HaCC Sustainment Task Order”][/block_title][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Sustainment Support is the gateway to DISA’s HaCC Compute Ops through the provision of customer-facing application and database administration support to mission partner-managed systems as well as DISA internal systems. Compute Ops provides full lifecycle application, web, and database implementation and sustainment services to deploy and sustain systems to full operational capabilities per Mission Partner specifications and requirements. Our team provides highly skilled and experienced technical staff to support this effort.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
